title: The Lady and the Lies
overview: Zheng Xue Er, a strong woman with a successful career, has no plans to get married. However, her mother was seriously ill, and in order to reassure her that she will found a decent husband, Xue Er decided to lower the criteria for choosing a mate and find an honest and stable person to marry and have children as soon as possible. Under the introduction of her best friend Mi Li Li, she met Song Hao Tian and married him in a flash. Soon her mother died and Zheng Xue Er put her efforts to achieve happiness on her new, small family. After marriage, Zheng Xue Er has been infertile due to physical reasons, and her mother-in-law is extremely dissatisfied with this. But even when she successfully became pregnant through test-tube technology, her mother-in-law's attitude towards her still didn't improve. As it wasn't enough, soon women discovers that Hao Tian, who like to adore his wife publicly, cheats on her with her friend, and they both plan to takeover her property. At first, wanting only to secretly investigate her husband's adultery, Zheng Xue Er, when she found out that her mother's death was also related to her husband, possessed by the need to avenge her, and pay for all the cruel things, those both do to her, began her revenge plan.
